text: let's say you're having trouble
motivating at work you having trouble
motivating get your emails under let's
say that you have a two-year-old or a
four-year-old and you're trying to teach
them how to have South's motivation what
should you do well there's been a huge
amount of research into this and one of
my favorite studies actually looks at
the US Marines and how they reformed
boot camp because a number of years ago
they were getting a bunch of recruits
who didn't know how to self motivate and
so the head of the Marines a guy named
General Charles Krulak decided to
redesign boot camp altogether to force
his recruits to make a lot more choices
now the reason why you have to make
choices is because it cultivates
something called an interior locus of
control people with an interior locus of
control they believe that they have
control over their destiny that the
choices that they make determine how
their life turns out people with an
exterior locus of control they're the
ones who believe the destiny just has
its way with them that the reason why
they failed is because they were unlucky
rather than because they didn't work
hard enough
so Charles Krulak redesigned bootcamp in
order to force people to develop an
interior locus of control by asking them
to make decision after decision after
decision they would go into the mess
hall and he would say after lunch you
need to clean everything up but we're
not going to tell you where the cleaning
supplies are we're not gonna tell you
whether the throw away that leftover
hamburgers are put them in the fridge or
how to load the big industrial
dishwasher you have to decide on your
own because the key to generating
motivation is learning just to make
choices if I can convince you to find a
choice any choice it's going to be
easier for you to motivate to get
something done so what does this mean
for us well it means if you're sitting
at your computer needed to do email and
you're having trouble motivating find
some choice any choice
anything that makes you feel like you're
in control decide to start with the
email in the middle of the inbox or if
someone's asking you to go to lunch just
type a quick sentence that says yeah
I'll go to lunch but we got to go eat
Indian food and so we can kind of hack
that part of our brain we can trigger it
automatically just by finding a choice
that makes us feel like we're in control
in making that decision it triggers our
motivation
even if we're not motivated
